name: FEV1FVC70FEV160AndCOPDSymptoms
title: FEV1/FVC <70, FEV1 <60, and COPD Symptoms
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Management of COPD),(Data Element Scope: HCPCS G code G8924),(Inclusion Criteria: Identification of certain COPD population),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)

concept.display: Spirometry test results demonstrate fev1/fvc < 70%, fev < 60% predicted and patient has copd symptoms (e.g., dyspnea, cough/sputum, wheezing)

contains.display: Spirometry test results demonstrate fev1/fvc < 70%, fev1 < 60% predicted and patient has copd symptoms (e.g., dyspnea, cough/sputum, wheezing)
